text: Mutsamudu is a city in the Comoros. Itâ€™s the capital of the island of Anjouan and is located in the northern part of the island. The population was 23,584 in 2021, making it the largest city on the island of Anjouan and the second- largest city in the Comoros. Category:Geography of the Comoros
title: Mutsamudu
